mean_en: connected with the amount or number of something rather than with how good it is
word_etyma: quantit(y)数量 + ative形容词后缀  → quantitative 量的，定量的
short_phrase: a quantitative analysis of the data
sentence: Our quantitative analysis shows that profits are indeed going up.
sentence_trans: 我们的定量分析显示利润的确在增长。
